title: Digital Marketing & Branding Intern
description: Join our dynamic marketing team as a Digital Marketing & Brand Strategy Intern. You will contribute to live campaigns across social media platforms, refine SEO strategy, and help develop cohesive brand identities for real clients. Perfect for students looking to apply marketing tools creatively and analytically in a fast-paced environment.
role:
Plan and execute digital campaigns on Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn
Perform SEO and keyword research to optimize content performance
Use Google Analytics and HubSpot for traffic, email, and funnel analysis
Collaborate with design team on brand identity creation using Canva and Adobe Illustrator
Build and present monthly analytics reports to leadership
